metadata.title: CVE-2023-0523 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from15.6 before 15.8.5, 15.9 before 15.9.4, and 15.10 before 15.10.1. An XSSwas possible via a malicious email address for certain instances.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
